name: Swordmaster Dedication
prereq: Member Of The Pathfinder Society Affiliated With The School Of Swords; Strength 14, Constitution 14, Or Dexterity 14
summary: Your Swords training taught you to never lose hold of your weapon.
description:
Your Swords training taught you to never lose hold of your weapon. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when foes attempt to Disarm you. If you have the Deft Cooperation feat and critically succeed on a check to Aid an allyâ€™s attack roll or skill check, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus from Deft Cooperation (instead of a +1 bonus) the first time you attempt an attack roll or attempt a skill check where the bonus would apply.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Swordmaster archetype.Swordmaster Dedication Leads To...

Armored Exercise, Armored Rest, Death's Door, Emergency Medical Assistance, Focus Ally, Forceful Shot, Harrying Strike, Improvised Crafting, Martial Exercise, Physical Training, Practiced Defender, Protect Ally, Quick Stow (Swordmaster), Recollect Studies, Reflexive Grip, Rugged Survivalist, Shoulder Catastrophe, Tense NegotiatorTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
